    • Method Detail

      • addMeasuredVariable

        int addMeasuredVariable(java.lang.String name,
                        java.lang.String unit,
                        double period,
                        int min_quality,
                        int max_quality)
        Add time series meta-data. This method creates a measured variable (e.g., temperature) defined by its name and unit and configures a time series period and quality thresholds.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the measured variable.
        unit - Unit of measurement.
        period - Sampling period of the time series.
        min_quality - Min quality of the time series.
        max_quality - Max quality of the time series.
        Returns:
        0 if creation fails, 1 if it is successful, or 2 if the measured variable or time series already exists.

      • addObservations

        boolean addObservations(java.lang.String name,
                        java.io.File csv_file)
        Import observations from a CSV file that contains exactly one time series with the following columns: timestamp, value, quality (in that order).
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the measured variable linked to the time series.
        csv_file - CSV file with columns: timestamp, value, quality.
        Returns:
        True if the observations are successfully loaded and the meta-data updated, false otherwise.

      • deleteTimeSeries

        boolean deleteTimeSeries(java.lang.String name)
        Delete time series meta-data along with its associated measured variable, and all related observations, aggregation tables and configurations.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the measured variable linked to the time series.
        Returns:
        True if all related data were deleted successfully, false otherwise.

      • deleteObservations

        boolean deleteObservations(java.lang.String name,
                           java.time.OffsetDateTime start_time,
                           java.time.OffsetDateTime end_time)
        Delete observations for a given time series in the specified time range and automatically update time series start date and end date.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the measured variable linked to the time series.
        start_time - Start time of the window.
        end_time - End time of the window.
        Returns:
        True if the observations were dropped successfully, false otherwise.

      • getMeasuredVariable

        fr.ubo.fast.common.model.MeasuredVariable getMeasuredVariable(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieve measured variable meta-data.
        Parameters:
        name - Measured variable name to look up.
        Returns:
        Measured variable meta-data, or null on failure.

      • getAllMeasuredVariables

        java.util.List<fr.ubo.fast.common.model.MeasuredVariable> getAllMeasuredVariables()
        Retrieves a list of all measured variables in the database.
        Returns:
        List of found measured variables.

      • getTimeSeries

        fr.ubo.fast.common.model.TimeSeries getTimeSeries(java.lang.String name)
        Retrieve time series meta-data.
        Parameters:
        name - Measured variable name linked to the given time series.
        Returns:
        Time series meta-data, or null on failure.

      • getAllTimeSeries

        java.util.List<fr.ubo.fast.common.model.TimeSeries> getAllTimeSeries()
        Retrieves a list of all time series in the database.
        Returns:
        List of found time series.
